feed.title: Combined summary - [Bitcoin Advent Calendar] RoadMap or Load o' Crap?

entry.title: Combined summary - [Bitcoin Advent Calendar] RoadMap or Load o' Crap?
entry.summary: Jeremy Rubin, in the final post of the advent calendar, discusses feasible schedules for deployment of upgrades to Bitcoin and the relevant window of opportunity for BIP-119 in 2022. He invites readers to use this as a starting point for discussion. In his article, he provides insights into the potential timelines for the implementation of upgrades to Bitcoin. The relevant window of opportunity for BIP-119 is discussed in detail, which is likely to be deployed in 2022.Rubin emphasizes that upgrading Bitcoin requires careful planning and execution, and it may take longer than expected to implement the necessary changes. The article can be found at https://rubin.io/bitcoin/2021/12/24/advent-27/. Readers are encouraged to use the information provided by Rubin as a starting point for further discussion.In conclusion, Jeremy Rubin wishes Merry Christmas to those who celebrate and thanks everyone for joining along on the advent calendar ride. His article provides valuable insights into the potential timelines for deploying upgrades to Bitcoin, and the discussion surrounding BIP-119 is particularly noteworthy. Overall, his post serves as a useful resource for those interested in the future development of Bitcoin.
